query:
INSERT INTO user_preferences (
            user_id,
            auto_subscribe,
            email_notifications,
            push_notifications,
            theme,
            language
        )
        VALUES (
            $1, 
            COALESCE($2, true),
            COALESCE($3, true), 
            COALESCE($4, true),
            COALESCE($5, 'system'),
            COALESCE($6, 'en')
        )
        ON CONFLICT (user_id)
        DO UPDATE SET
            auto_subscribe = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.auto_subscribe, user_preferences.auto_subscribe),
            email_notifications = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.email_notifications, user_preferences.email_notifications),
            push_notifications = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.push_notifications, user_preferences.push_notifications),
            theme = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.theme, user_preferences.theme),
            language = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.language, user_preferences.language)
